content: hey there maker friend i m so excited to introduce you to pete the positive potato a little spud with a big heart and an even bigger smile this adorable crochet pattern is perfect for spreading joy and positivity one stitch at a time thank you for spreading smiles and creativity with your hooks don t forget to tag me in your photos of pete i d love to see how your happy potato turns out ✨ warm hugs and happy stitching ali - @threadsofyesternight materials size 5 weight yarn in light brown for potato 4mm hook 10mm safety eyes black yarn for embroidering smile polyester fiberfill stuffing scissors yarn needle stitch marker optional pattern key chain = chain st s = stitch es single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase 2 single_crochet in one st decrease = decrease single_crochet decrease double_crochet = double_crochet notes chain does not count as a stitch place a stitch marker in the first stitch of every round as you work through the body can be made with different yarn types and weights but sizing may vary as well as placement of the features
